name: DemonRun
description:
*NOTE:  play in 1080p full-screen for optimal experience*

This is a game in which your goal is to escape from hell. You have to kill the demons trying to stop you from escaping.

Controls: 

A:Left

D:Right

Shoot and aim: mouse and left click

Categories:

Criteria #1: Endless Runner

This game is an endless runner

Criteria #2: Fantasy

This is set in a fantasy hell setting, where you are chased by red demons

Criteria #3: Devil May Care

The player is reckless in this game, you can kill 100s of demons

Criteria #4: Epic Music

The music has a motivational beat and is based on a Choir.

Assets used:

I created  everything myself except the demon animations which come from Mixamo.com. And I used a Choir loop upon which I created my own beat: https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/155613/women-digital-chorus-120bpm-ambien...
